updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Emergent Sequence is now in the Quandrix college instead of Witherbloom (thanks @wreimers). Also un-broke Set Boosters.
Added Set Boosters, with The List and Art Cards.
Collector boosters regular C/U/R/M slots no longer include Lessons.
Prerelease college boosters now contain multi-colour cards for that college's colours.
Collector Booster slot 5 no longer overridden by slot 7's U/R/M lessons.
Prerelease college booster now adhere to each college's colours.
Draft booster now has proper Mystical Archives and foils.
Japanese Mystical Archive cards no longer appear in Draft Booster MA slot.
